name: repotox
description: Lightweight schematox schema based ORM for mogodb driver
author: Kanstantin Mazur

scripts.prettier-check: prettier --check . || (echo "Please use 'npm run prettify' to fix the issue" && exit 1)
scripts.quality-check: npm run prettier-check && npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test
scripts.check-n-build: npm run quality-check && npm run build
scripts.publish-patch: npm run check-n-build && npm version patch && npm run check-n-build && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: npm run check-n-build && npm version minor && npm run check-n-build && npm publish
